snippet: A grenade was tossed outside a nightclub in a tourist area in Kuala Lumpur on Thursday, killing one man and wounding 12 others, including foreigners from Singapore, Thailand and China.
abstract: Grenade is tossed outside nightclub in a tourist area in Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia, killing one man and wounding 12 others, including foreigners from Singapore, Thailand and China.
lead_paragraph: A grenade was tossed outside a nightclub in a tourist area in Kuala Lumpur on Thursday, killing one man and wounding 12 others, including foreigners from Singapore, Thailand and China.

headline.main: Malaysia: One Dead and 12 Wounded in Grenade Blast
headline.print_headline: Malaysia: One Dead and 12 Wounded in Grenade Blast
